channel.title: Matisyahu - Reggae musician and great stoner music
channel.description:
A buddy of mine whom I met randomly in my campus dancing in the street told me of this great band, Matisyahu.
Check out the song One Day and let me know what you think. Song: http://www.dizzler.com/music/Matisyahu - Scroll down and click on One Day Lyrics: http://www.ilike.com/artist/Matisyahu/track/One+Day
'sometimes in my tears I drown, but I never let it get me down, so when negativity surrounds, I know someday it'll all turn around'
~Ron
